ADX-INR.summary: AdEx Network (ADX) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. AdEx Network has a current supply of 125,604,061.84973384 with 118,461,585.50973384 in circulation. The last known price of AdEx Network is 1.24170527 USD and is down -3.80 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 20 active market(s) with $5,311,732.29 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.adex.network/.
